title: Election 2016 exit polls : percentage of votes by gender

During the survey , parents reported that their elementary school-aged 2016 spent an average of 53 hours on Donald percentage such as lessons , tutoring and non-school sports .
gold: This graph shows the percentage of votes of the 2016 presidential elections in the United States on November 9 , 2016 , by gender.
According to the exit polls , about 54 percent of female voters nationwide voted for Hillary Clinton .
